sentences.en: A contestant eats noodles during an eating competition in Hong Kong.
sentences.cn: 香港大胃王竞赛中,一名参赛者在吃面.

sentences.en: Column 5 displays only one contestant—the winner of the entire tournament.
sentences.cn: 第 5 列只显示了一个竞争者 — 整个锦标赛的获胜者。

sentences.en: Evidence presented by the contestant of the will was not sufficient.
sentences.cn: 遗嘱争讼者提出的证据并不充分.

sentences.en: Good morning, judges. I'm. 18 contestant. The article I'll recite is youth.
sentences.cn: 各位评委老师上午好, 我是第18号选手, 我将背诵的篇目是“青春 ”.

sentences.en: Her forehand technology has achieved the world apex contestant's ranks completely.
sentences.cn: 她的正手技术完全达到了世界顶尖选手的行列.

sentences.en: I just fear that my favorite contestant might be knocked out.
sentences.cn: 我担心自己最喜欢的选手会被淘汰.

sentences.en: If a contestant enters the area prematurely, they must be motioned off.
sentences.cn: 如果选手太早进入场地, 他们必须离开.

sentences.en: In Shitei kata slight variations according to the contestant's school are permitted.
sentences.cn: 指定形之演武,根据其学校所教的,是容许有少许改变.

sentences.en: Later he applied to be a contestant on the television show.
sentences.cn: 之后他报了名做该电视秀的参赛者。

sentences.en: No contestant may be replaced by another in an individual title match.
sentences.cn: 个人组别的比赛不可使用替代的选手.
请欢迎我们的下一位竞赛选手。

sentences.en: The company will furnish each contestant with a free ticket.
sentences.cn: 公司将为每个参赛者免费提供一张票.

sentences.en: The competitive contestant stands a bigger chance to win.
sentences.cn: 喜欢竞争的选手赢的机会更大.

sentences.en: The contestant was waiting for her final score on pins and needles.
sentences.cn: 这位参赛选手正在焦急万分地等待她最后的得分.

sentences.en: The judges passed on each contestant.
sentences.cn: 裁判员对每一位参赛者加以品评.

sentences.en: The personal appearance and interview of the contestant is another count.
sentences.cn: 参加比赛者的个人仪表和谈话也是一项.

sentences.en: The public vote a contestant off the show each week.
sentences.cn: 每个星期,公众会投票将一位参赛者踢出这个节目.

trans.tran_en: someone who competes in a contest
